Code@Night, Friday Night!

Feb 24, 2013

Code@Night's are great. They're a bonding experience. They're programming experience. And there's pizza. They really couldn't come often enough. The next one? Friday, March 1, 2013.

You're invited! We'll be on the third floor of Sherrerd Hall starting at 9pm. That's March 1, 2013. Mark your calendars.


ACM wins Collaborative Campus Challenge

May 8, 2012

Congratulations to all the students who came out to participate in the InterviewStreet Collaborative Campus Challenge. We took first place and won office hours with Jared Karim, one of the founders of YouTube!

If you're interested in joining us for the office hours, get in touch by email.

Princeton teams organized by ACM also took all top prizes at Google Games New York, held on April 21. Everyone who went had a great time!


C@N[1][6]

Apr 14, 2012

Bridgewater, the $120bn hedge fund, is presenting a tech talk and cool goodies.

Come meet the new board. We're also unveiling the redesign of the all new ACM website!

Friday at 9pm, Sherrerd Hall conference room - see you there.


C@N[1][5]

Mar 8, 2012

HEY ACM:

Come to ACM's next code@night!
Friday, March 9, 9pm - 9am
3rd floor Sherrerd Hall (CITP lounge)

Come to code ALL NIGHT in the presence of pizza, snacks, caffeine,
carbonation, power, mystery, and other human beings.

Stress with your fellow coders over your approaching midterms. Use the
room's energy to attack your work!

See you Friday.


C@N[1][4]

Jan 12, 2012

HEY ACM!

Code@Night on Friday! (Yes during Reading Period.) Sponsored by TokBox.

You wonder: what's a TokBox? Welll...

----

The OpenTok API, created by TokBox, makes it dead simple to add face-to-face communication into a site or app experience.  Check out the OpenTok Gallery to see partner apps ranging from collaboration tools to gaming.

Interested in developing your own OpenTok powered app? IncuBox is a student developer competition that will award one team the chance to incubate out of TokBox’s San Francisco HQ for 8 weeks during the summer of 2012.  Apply now!

----

A real coder from TokBox will be there Friday at 10pm to give a talk and throughout the night to hang out with us! Sweet!

You further wonder: why should I attend this Code@Night? Welll...

* CODE around others!

* STRESS about Dean's Date around others!

* You could learn how to add video chat to your COS 318 file system

* You could add a video chat command to your COS 217 ish shell

* You could start a new COS 429 final project with video chat images

* You could query and parse results from video chatting to add to your COS 402 machine learning algs

* Drink --free-- sodas / energy drinks / water / random other beverages that we feel like buying

* Eat --free-- pizza / snacks / fruit / green beans

* POWER SO MUCH POWER ZOMG

* Sit in comfy chairs

* Learn about TokBox

So...You should come to Code@Night. QED, yo.

FRIDAY 1/13 9PM

SHERRERD HALL, 3rd FLOOR

SPONSORED BY TOKBOX, WHO WILL TALK AT 10

IT'S FUNNNNN

https://www.facebook.com/events/304070296296218/
